I liked it. The emotion, the character design, the story , it was all pretty good. I didn't think that cheating tag would work for me but it actually worked out pretty well. Now I'm sure people are going to see the negatives this is on a moral level but considering this is a porno, with a cheating tag, with a character that was cheating before she had sex, who allowed the deal to wait for 1 month so she could be convinced to choose another man, and who agreed to have sex instead of talking things over with her boyfriend. No one is in the right here. Luckily it's a freaking porno and a pretty good one at that. I highly recommend this being a favorite to anyone.

Oh yea here is a story posted dumb ass, i make it a quick since it was long. Husband and wife married 30+ years (highschool sweet hearts) great marriage and husband is proud they only been with each other. They have 3 daughters all 30+ years old, the youngest which is the fathers favorite decides to do Dna test to see there lineage from his side of the family. Get the test back to find out all 3 of hid daughters are not his, when he confronted the wife she confessed she had a 8 year affair with there (Highschool friend they went to school with). Husband leaves and ppl go search for him for 3 days to find him in there vacation home where he hung himself. The daughter that took the test posted and feels its all her fault. Theres many more posts like this not this tragic but fit the bill
